metadata.title: CVE-2018-6952 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: A double free exists in the another_hunk function in pch.c in GNU patch through 2.7.6.

notes.note: mdeslaur> The patch for this introduced CVE-2019-20633, and no complete fix is available from upstream as of 2022-01-05

criterions.comment: patch package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
